abstract: The resignation of Eric E. Schmidt was described as a mutual decision. Regulators say they are still investigating a board overlap between the companies.
snippet: The resignation of Eric E. Schmidt was described as a mutual decision. Regulators say they are still investigating a board overlap between the companies.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  The alliance between Apple and Google, two Silicon Valley giants with a powerful common enemy in Microsoft, is now clearly fraying.

headline.main: Google Chief Gives Up Board Seat at Apple
headline.print_headline: Google Chief Gives Up Board Seat At Apple

abstract: In a sign that two longtime allies in the computer world are beginning to compete for more business, the computer maker Apple announced on Monday that Eric Schmidt, chief executive of Google, was stepping down from its board.
snippet: In a sign that two longtime allies in the computer world are beginning to compete for more business, the computer maker Apple announced on Monday that Eric Schmidt, chief executive of Google, was stepping down from its board.
lead_paragraph: In a sign that two longtime allies in the computer world are beginning to compete for more business, the computer maker Apple announced on Monday that Eric E. Schmidt, chief executive of Google, was stepping down from its board.

headline.main: Google Chief Resigns From Apple’s Board
